title: Ghost: “Catch the Ghost” - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Horror   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Level System   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnation   Stoic Characters
author: San Tian Liang Jiao   三天两觉
description:
Wang Xu was a cranky introvert weirdo. He rented a lodge house next to a cemetery to save money. After having been threatened by a supernatural incident, he decided to dig graves to take revenge on ghosts. Fortunately, he found the Devil Subduing Journal there.

Entering the ghost hunting journey with no way back, how would his life be?

Let’s follow the novel ‘Ghost: Catch the ghost’ to enjoy the ultimate of humor…

>
